definitions.definition: Opposition or repugnance of mind; fixed dislike often without any conscious reasoning .
examples: Due to her aversion to the outdoors she complained throughout the entire camping trip.

definitions.definition: An object of dislike or repugnance.
examples: Pushy salespeople are a major aversion of mine.

definitions.definition: The act of turning away from an object.

main_definition: Opposition or repugnance of mind; fixed dislike often without any conscious reasoning .
secondary_definitions: An object of dislike or repugnance.
( obsolete ) The act of turning away from an object.
